articles.author: Mahalunggu Jubilee
articles.title: Why summer solstice is one of the best times to see Stonehenge
articles.description: Experience the mystery of this prehistoric monument during the midsummer sunrise.

articles.author: ZE
articles.title: Prehistoric tree is first of its kind found below the Equator
articles.description: New fossils suggest the chinquapin, found today in parts of Asia, first took root in the Southern Hemisphere.
